info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-spanning-tree-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions for
     monitoring vlans in a Network Element.
     Copyright (c) 2016-2017, 2019, 2022-2025 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Other Services
**Paths:** 18

get.description: Top-level container for spanning tree operational data
List of mst/rapid-pvst spanning-tree, keyed by instance name (collection)
List of mst/rapid-pvst spanning-tree, keyed by instance name
List of vlan on spanning-tree, keyed by vlan id (collection)
List of vlan on spanning-tree, keyed by vlan id
List of mst/rapid-pvst spanning-tree, keyed by instance name (collection)
List of mst/rapid-pvst spanning-tree, keyed by instance name
List of vlan on spanning-tree, keyed by vlan id (collection)
List of vlan on spanning-tree, keyed by vlan id

name.description: Reference to the STP ethernet interface

cost.description: The port's contribution, when it is the root port, to the root path cost for the bridge

port-priority.description: The manageable component of the Port Identifier, also known as the Port Priority

port-num.description: The port number of the bridge port

role.description: The current role of the bridge port

state.description: The current state of the bridge port

designated-root-priority.description: The bridge priority of the root of the spanning tree, as determined by the Spanning Tree Protocol, as executed by this node

designated-root-address.description: The bridge address of the root of the spanning tree, as determined by the Spanning Tree Protocol, as executed by this node

designated-cost.description: The path cost of the Designated Port of the segment connected to this port

designated-bridge-priority.description: The bridge priority of the bridge that this port considers to be the designated bridge for this port's segment

designated-bridge-address.description: The bridge address of the bridge that this port considers to be the designated bridge for this port's segment

designated-port-priority.description: The Port priority of the port on the Designated Bridge for this port's segment, two octet string

designated-port-num.description: The Port number of the port on the Designated Bridge for this port's segment, two octet string

forward-transitions.description: The number of times this port has transitioned from the Learning state to the Forwarding state

bpdu-sent.description: The number of BPDU packet sent

bpdu-received.description: The number of BPDU packet received

oper-p2p.description: Spanning tree vlan interface operational link-type is point-to-point

oper-portfast-edge.description: Spanning tree interface is operating in portfast EDGE

guard-status.description: Interface's spanning tree guard inconsistent status

agg-port-id.description: The number of the etherchannel group

legacy.description: Spanning tree is operating in legacy STP mode.

hello-time.description: The interval between periodic transmissions of configuration messages by designated ports

max-age.description: The maximum age of the information transmitted by the bridge when it is the root bridge

forwarding-delay.description: The delay used by STP bridges to transition root and designated ports to forwarding

hold-count.description: The maximum number of BPDUs per second that the switch can send from an interface

bridge-priority.description: The manageable component of the Bridge Identifier

bridge-address.description: A unique 48-bit Universally Administered MAC Address assigned to the bridge

root-port.description: The port number of the port which offers the lowest cost path from this bridge to the root bridge

root-cost.description: The cost of the path to the root as seen from this bridge

hold-time.description: This time value determines the interval length during which no more than two Configuration bridge PDUs shall be transmitted by this node

topology-changes.description: The total number of topology changes detected by this bridge since the management entity was last reset or initialized

time-of-last-topology-change.description: The time of the last topology change that was detected by the bridge entity.The time is POSIX time UTC

root-if-name.description: Root interface name of the STP root port

protocol.description: Indicates the type of Spanning Tree Protocol currently being used on the switch

aging-time.description: The aging timer refers to the duration that the switch keeps track of learned MAC addresses

mode.description: Spanning tree mode enabled on the device

etherchannel-misconfig-guard.description: Enable guard to protect against etherchannel misconfiguration

total-vlan.description: Total number of VLANs in the spanning tree instance

total-vblk.description: Total count of ports in the blocking state across all VLAN instances

total-vlstn.description: Total count of ports in the listening state across all VLAN instances

total-vlrn.description: Total count of ports in the learning state across all VLAN instances

total-vfwd.description: Total count of ports in the forwarding state across all VLAN instances

total-vactv.description: Total count of active spanning tree instances across all VLAN instances

total-mst.description: Total number of MST in the spanning tree instance
